alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 02 at 9:58AM CDT until August 02 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Illinois, including the following county, Fayette. * WHEN...Until 1130 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 958 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 2.5 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... St. Elmo, Farina, Wrights Corner, La Clede and St. James. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Illinois near exit 76. Interstate 57 in Illinois near exit 135.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
